name: SpaceGas
description:
Imprisoned and left with nothing but his digestive tract our unlikely protagonist escapes into the void. Make your way through 21 levels of vacuous hardships. 

CONTROLS:

AD - to rotate

Space  - to fart

May the force of beans be with you ...

Made by Ondřej Černý (@sprrotex), Jan Hermoch & Otto Hartvich (@hartvichio)

Feel free to download the source code here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1PhIIsSr8YETzDG8btivVS5vpO_4rG1hC

Web version available here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/739615
